name: The Adventures Of Gorlag
description:
Play in Full Screen mode. The Adventures of Gorlag was made for the Dungeon Crawler Jam '23 in 7 days by Heavy and Swampy. We explored the duality of playing an orc hostage instead of the traditional adventuring party. TAoG is a classic "gridder" with orthogonal movement, tile-based puzzles, and RPG elements.

Instructions

Move with WADS or arrow keys. Turn with Q and E. Click and drag weapons into left hand and keys into right hand. Game saves at Healing shrines and when exiting game.
